mapper.insert: insert into minihome_board_folders(folder_no, minihome_no, folder_name, folder_category_no) values (minihome_board_folder_no_seq.nextval, #{miniHomeNo}, '전체보기', #{categoryNo})
mapper.select: select folder_no as no, minihome_no as miniHomeNo, folder_name as name, folder_parent_no as parentNo, folder_category_no as categoryNo from minihome_board_folders where folder_no = #{value}

select folder_no as no, minihome_no as miniHomeNo, folder_name as name, folder_parent_no as parentNo, folder_category_no as categoryNo from minihome_board_folders where minihome_no = #{miniHomeNo} and folder_category_no = #{categoryNo} and folder_parent_no is null
select folder_no as no, minihome_no as miniHomeNo, folder_name as name, folder_parent_no as parentNo, folder_category_no as categoryNo from minihome_board_folders where folder_parent_no = #{value}

select folder_no as no, minihome_no as miniHomeNo, folder_name as name, folder_parent_no as parentNo, folder_category_no as categoryNo from minihome_board_folders where minihome_no = #{miniHomeNo} and folder_category_no = #{categoryNo} and folder_parent_no = #{parentFolderNo} order by folder_no asc
